projects.title: College Event Management System
projects.description: Developed a system featuring dynamic form rendering for seamless group registration. Integrated automated fee calculation to generate custom payment QR codes, ensuring accurate billing and eliminating manual errors.

projects.title: HR Management & Payroll Automation
projects.description: Built a web application to streamline HR operations, integrating leave management directly with payroll systems. The application eliminates data redundancy and calculation errors by automatically synchronizing approved leave records.

projects.title: Hostel Management Web App
projects.description: Engineered a responsive hostel booking platform featuring secure authentication, RBAC, and dynamic search tools. Optimized backend logic to handle real-time inventory management and seamless transaction processing.

projects.title: Voice to Sign Language Translator
projects.description: Developed a full-stack web application using Python and Flask that translates spoken English into continuous Sign Language video animations in real-time, leveraging NLP for text analysis.
